News.headline: Loan Update: 7th March 2017
News.short_description: Update on Daggers Loan players Hyde, Heard, Shepherd and White
News.description:
Striker Joe White played 86 minutes for Wealdstone FC as the Vanarama National League South side won 2-1 at home to Gosport Borough to move up to 10th place in the table.

Midfielder Scott heard played the full 90 minutes and won his side a penalty in East Thurrock’s 6-1 away defeat to Ebbsfleet United on Saturday.

Defender Jimmy Shepherd and midfielder Tyrique Hyde were both unused substitutes for Whitehawk FC in their 1-0 win at home to Welling United.

Forward Shomari Barnwell has returned to the Daggers after his recent loan spell at Vanarama National League South side Bishop’s Stortford.
